1.19.2.1.3.0:
Added localization support for the /check command
Added the /home command
Added support for players to set up their own homes
Added support for players with command permission level 2 can set other players homes
Added support for players teleporting to their own homes
Added support for players teleporting to other players homes if anyone_can_use_home_tp is true
Added home_world, jail_world, and pre_jail_world to the player config files
Added spawn_world to the world config files
Added anyone_can_use_home_tp and anyone_can_use_spawn_tp to the settings file
Added the /check command
Added support for checking player config values
Added support for checking the buy and sell item prices
Added loan to player config file generation
Added loan_debt to player config file generation
Added loan_debt_cap to player config file generation
Updated the way config files generate. They will now load in a specific order from one file
Updated the find item procedure for the /sell command to match the buy command system
Updated the sell item command procedure to match the /buy command system
Updated config version from 2 to 3 new settings will auto-generate the world is loaded
Removed lone from player config file generation
Removed lone_debt from player config file generation
Removed lone_debt_cap from player config file generation
Removed support for the player lone settings
Fixed typo for the variable loan spelled lone
1.19.2.1.2.0:
Added world config generation
Added default player and world config files
Added support for default player settings in the settings.json file
Added buy_items.json config file for the items which can be sold to the game
Added procedure for getting the buy price for the item if it exists
Added procedure for generating the buy_items config file
Added the /buy command
Added support for the buy and sell item command not needing an amount, the default value will be 1 item
Added a /buy command parameter called <items> to the /buy command
Added a /buy command parameter called <item> to the /buy <items> command group
Added a /buy command parameter called [amount] to the /buy <items> <item> command
Added a /sell command parameter called <hand> to the /sell <items> command
Added a /sell command parameter called [amount] to the /sell <items> <hand> command
Added message to the root /buy command if the items group is not typed
Added a player config value called stint, a number value
Changed the sell command parameter name <item> to the /sell <items>
Updated the help message for the /sell command
Updated config version from 1 to 2 new settings will auto-generate the world is loaded
Updated the wiki pages and added more documentation
1.19.2.1.1.0:
Added sell_items.json config file for the items which can be sold to the game
Added a procedure for getting the price for the sell_items.json file
Added a procedure for generating the sell_items config file
Added /sell command
Added parameter the sell command for item
Added message to the root sell command if the item is not typed
Added support for tags (tag) and registry (reg) in the config file
Added ID system for reading the file. The ID should be increased by one per line
Added a couple of tags for the default config file
1.19.2.1.0.0:
Added mod config file
Added player economy file
Added support for config settings
Added auto patch support for player economy files
Added mod logo.png
